title: CHAOS (Constraint-Based Holistic Approach for Optimal Synthesis) Workshop for Water Polo Team Training Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sports training theory and fundamental knowledge of language education
context.additional_context: Practicing professionals learn to integrate scientific evidence and practical demands when designing water polo team training. They acquire a trainable design framework applicable to real-world scenarios through modular learning in mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for comprehensively analyzing physical, cognitive, and emotional needs when designing team training programs
Learners can design context-specific training programs using constraint-based approaches
Learners can develop field-applicable training scenarios by utilizing microlearning content provided on mobile platforms
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
